title: [Large-Scale] Intensive Programming Fundamentals Course Utilizing Subgoal Learning Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental programming terminology and basic knowledge of algorithmic concepts
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-based LMS with project-based assessments and real-time feedback

learning_goals: Students can divide complex programming tasks into three or more logical steps using subgoal labels when solving programming problems.
Learners can apply subgoal-themed annotations to over 80% of activities during project task execution.
After completing education, students can explain problem-solving processes in AP exam-style practical tasks as structured text of 150+ characters.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
